dev.description: I've placed backend development languages and frameworks (such as Java or Spring Framework) here.

web.description: Here I put information on tools for building UI and simple websites. You can find here frontend frameworks as well as different useful CMS and headless-CMS tools.

ops.description: This quadrant clusters technologies around the operation of software and infrastructure related platforms, tools and services.

tools.description: Here I put common software tools and small helpers. Also this quadrant is used to place uncategorized technologies.
